column2: As part of our program of military modernization, a corps of combat engineers has been established, trained in the use of explosives and close range weaponry to overcome enemy fortifications.
column3: Dans le cadre de notre programme de modernisation militaire, un corps d’ingénieurs de combat a été créé, entrainé à l’utilisation d’explosifs et d’armes à courte portée pour capturer les fortifications ennemies.
column4: Als Teil unserer Modernisierung des Militärs wurde eine Pionier-Spezialeinheit geschaffen, trainiert im Umgang mit Sprengstoffen und Nahkampfwaffen zur Überwindung feindlicher Befestigungen.

column2: The modernization of our army now encompasses the best of our troops, who have adapted to the requirements of modern war. Not only are they second to none with bayonet, they look quite smart outside the royal palace too!
column3: La modernisation de notre armée s’étant maintenant à nos meilleures troupes, adaptées aux besoins de la guerre moderne. Non seulement ils sont supérieures à tout dans l’utilisation de la baïonnette, mais ils sont d’une rare élégance devant le palais royal!
column4: Die militärischen Modernisierungen machen auch vor den Besten unserer Truppe nicht Halt. Wir haben diese nun als Garde etabliert um den Anforderungen moderner Kriege besser gerecht zu werden. Und sie sehen auch noch besonders schick aus in ihren neuen Uniformen...

column2: Our heavy cavalry has been equipped with firearms and reorganized according to European model. It is a potent shock weapon as capable of riding through enemy ranks as giving fire support, though in the context of modern war, it has by necessity been given a supporting role subservient to the infantry that forms the core of our new army.
column3: Notre cavalerie lourde est maintenant équipée d’armes à feu, et réorganisée suivant le modèle européen. C’est un instrument de choc autant capable de charger à travers les rangs ennemis que de fournir une puissance de feu en soutient, même si dans le contexte de la guerre moderne, son rôle est bien sûr de soutenir l’infanterie, le cœur de notre armée.
column4: Unsere schwere Kavallerie wurde mit Gewehren ausgerüstet und somit zu einer potenten Waffe, die feindliche Linien durchbricht, schockierende Wirkung erzeugt und dadurch wirksame Unterstützung für die Infanterie als Kern unserer modernisierten Armee leistet.

column2: Our light cavalry has been integrated into the structure of our army along European lines, dedicated entirely to ground control and outflanking.
column3: Notre cavalerie légère est intégrée dans notre armée, dédiée entièrement au control du terrain et à la prise à revers de l’ennemie.
column4: Unsere leichte Kavallerie wurde nunmehr in die Linienformationen moderner europäischer Heere integriert. Dort kann sie effektiv das Schlachtfeld kontrollieren und die Linien flankierend unterstützen.

column2: These are the first steam-powered warships, using a combination of steam and sail for high speed and maximum operational versatility. While they do not yet outclass sailships, they are a step towards a completely steam-powered navy.
column3: Ce sont les premiers vaisseaux à vapeur, utilisant une combinaison de voile et vapeur pour des vitesses élevées et une flexibilité opérationnelle maximum. Ils ne surpassent pas encore les navires à voile, mais sont un premier pas vers une flotte marchant à la vapeur.
column4: These are the first steam-powered warships, using a combination of steam and sail for high speed and maximum operational versatility. While they do not yet outclass sailships, they are a step towards a completely steam-powered navy.

column2: When steam engines became powerful enough to propel a ship completely encased in metal, the nature of naval warfare changed profoundly. Wooden warships quickly became obsolete, and armament developers were faced with the necessity to develop armour-piercing weaponry.
column3: A partir du moment où les moteurs à vapeur sont devenus assez puissants pour propulser des navires entièrement en métal, la nature des guerres navales a complètement changée. Les navires en bois devinrent obsolètes, et les développeurs d'armement durent concevoir des armes perce-blindage.
column4: When steam engines became powerful enough to propel a ship completely encased in metal, the nature of naval warfare changed profoundly. Wooden warships quickly became obsolete, and armament developers were faced with the necessity to develop armour-piercing weaponry.

column2: Further advances in naval propulsion have made it possible for the ironclad to mature into a full-grown battleship, being larger as well as faster as well as capable of supporting an all-metal hull.
column3: De nouveaux progrès en propulsion navale ont rendu possibles la création de vrais cuirassés, plus grands, plus rapides, et avec des coques entièrement en métal.
column4: Further advances in naval propulsion have made it possible for the ironclad to mature into a full-grown battleship, being larger as well as faster as well as capable of supporting an all-metal hull.

column2: Steam turbines allow for even more power per unit of fuel than compound engines, in turn allowing us to build even larger and faster warships. If we undertake armament and hull development that makes use of this advantage, we will soon be able to build a warship that outclasses everything built up to this point. With it, we will be all-powerful and need dread nought. Dreadnought. Has a nice ring to it, don't you think?
column3: Les turbines à vapeur permettent une puissance encore plus grande par unité d'essence que les moteurs à actions multiples, nous permettant de construire des vaisseaux encore plus grands et plus rapides. Si nous développons des armements et blindages exploitant cet avantage, nous pourront bientôt construire un vaisseau dépassant tous ceux déjà lancés. Un vaisseau qui ne craindrait rien... "Dreadnought", ça sonne bien, non?
column4: Steam turbines allow for even more power per unit of fuel than compound engines, in turn allowing us to build even larger and faster warships. If we undertake armament and hull development that makes use of this advantage, we will soon be able to build a warship that outclasses everything built up to this point. With it, we will be all-powerful and need dread nought. Dreadnought. Has a nice ring to it, don't you think?

column2: By dividing the adiabatic expansion of steam in a steam engine into several stages, a higher energetic efficiency can be achieved. In practical terms, this means more powerful engines and faster warships.
column3: En divisant l'expension de la vapeur dans un moteur en plusieurs stages, une plus grande efficacité énergétique est possible. En d'autres termes: des vaisseaux plus puissants et plus rapides.
column4: By dividing the adiabatic expansion of steam in a steam engine into several stages, a higher energetic efficiency can be achieved. In practical terms, this means even faster warships.

column2: The introduction of iron plating made warships nearly impervious to existing naval guns. The most straightforward solution was simply to make bigger guns.
column3: L'utilisation de blindages en fer a rendu les vaisseaux presque insensibles aux canons navals existants. La solution la plus simple est de créer des canons plus gros.
column4: The introduction of iron plating made warships nearly impervious to existing naval guns. The most straightforward solution was simply to make bigger guns.

column2: A novel solution to the problem of overcoming the armour plating of ironclads is the use of larger, self-propelled explosive charges to blast holes in the enemy hull under the waterline. While hardly the most accurate of weapons, they make up for it with their destructive power.
column3: Une nouvelle solution au problème posé par les blindages des cuirassés est l'utilisation de charges explosives plus grosses et autopropulsées pour attaquer la coque ennemie sous la ligne de flottaison. Ce n'est pas l'arme la plus précise, mais elle compense par sa puissance destructive.
column4: A novel solution to the problem of overcoming the armour plating of ironclads is the use of larger, self-propelled explosive charges to blast holes in the enemy hull under the waterline. While hardly the most accurate of weapons, they make up for it with their destructive power.

column2: With ship armour being what it is nowadays, it is possible to actually get close to an enemy ship without getting shot up too badly on the way. This not only makes ramming possible, but a quite effective way of sinking the enemy too.
column3: Avec les blindages navals modernes, il est même possible de s'approcher d'un navire ennemie sans se faire trop abîmer en route. Non seulement l'éperonner devient possible, mais c'est même un moyen plutôt efficace de couler l'ennemie.
column4: With ship armour being what it is nowadays, it is possible to actually get close to an enemy ship without getting shot up too badly on the way. This not only makes ramming possible, but a quite effective way of sinking the enemy too.

column2: Breech-loading guns provide many benefits over muzzle-loading guns, such as higher rate of fire and fitting into a smaller space. Technical difficulties impeded their initial adaptation but by the 1880s, they had all but superseded muzzle-loading guns.
column3: Les canons chargés par la culasse ont beaucoup d'avantages par rapport à ceux chargés par la gueule, comme une cadence supérieure et un gain de place. Des difficultés techniques avaient ralenties leur adaptation initiale, mais à partir de 1880, ils s'étaient complétement imposés.
column4: Breech-loading guns provide many benefits over muzzle-loading guns, such as higher rate of fire and fitting into a smaller space. Technical difficulties impeded their initial adaptation but by the 1880s, they had all but superseded muzzle-loading guns.

column2: Developments such as breech-loading, cartridges and recoil buffering have permitted low-calibre guns to achieve a very high rate of fire, making them supreme weapons at close range.
column3: Developments such as breech-loading, cartridges and recoil buffering have permitted low-calibre guns to achieve a very high rate of fire, making them supreme weapons at close range.
column4: Developments such as breech-loading, cartridges and recoil buffering have permitted low-calibre guns to achieve a very high rate of fire, making them supreme weapons at close range.

column2: By raising a few turrets onto elevated platforms and having them fire over the others, a larger number of turrets can be fit on the deck of a dreadnought while still bringing all of them to bear against a target in almost any direction.
column3: By raising a few turrets onto elevated platforms and having them fire over the others, a larger number of turrets can be fit on the deck of a dreadnought while still bringing all of them to bear against a target in almost any direction.
column4: By raising a few turrets onto elevated platforms and having them fire over the others, a larger number of turrets can be fit on the deck of a dreadnought while still bringing all of them to bear against a target in almost any direction.

column2: With all guns that matter being of equal calibre, fire control and direction can effectively be centralized for greater accuracy.
column3: With all guns that matter being of equal calibre, fire control and direction can effectively be centralized for greater accuracy.
column4: With all guns that matter being of equal calibre, fire control and direction can effectively be centralized for greater accuracy.

column2: To maintain their relevancy in the era of dreadnoughts, smaller ships were equipped with anti-capital torpedoes as their main armament.
column3: To maintain their relevancy in the era of dreadnoughts, smaller ships were equipped with anti-capital torpedoes as their main armament.
column4: To maintain their relevancy in the era of dreadnoughts, smaller ships were equipped with anti-capital torpedoes as their main armament.

column2: The use of optical instruments greatly improves measurement of range to a target, improving the accuracy of gunnery.
column3: The use of optical instruments greatly improves measurement of range to a target, improving the accuracy of gunnery.
column4: The use of optical instruments greatly improves measurement of range to a target, improving the accuracy of gunnery.

column2: Why settle for two per turret when you can have three? More guns!
column3: Why settle for two per turret when you can have three? More guns!
column4: Why settle for two per turret when you can have three? More guns!

column2: With a hull divided into sealable, watertight compartments, a ship can withstand more outer hull breaches under the waterline without sinking.
column3: With a hull divided into sealable, watertight compartments, a ship can withstand more outer hull breaches under the waterline without sinking.
column4: With a hull divided into sealable, watertight compartments, a ship can withstand more outer hull breaches under the waterline without sinking.

column2: By alternating layers of wood and metal, a structure is achieved which is almost as shock-resistant as pure metal armour, while being significantly lighter and cheaper to build.
column3: By alternating layers of wood and metal, a structure is achieved which is almost as shock-resistant as pure metal armour, while being significantly lighter and cheaper to build.
column4: By alternating layers of wood and metal, a structure is achieved which is almost as shock-resistant as pure metal armour, while being significantly lighter and cheaper to build.

column2: The change in armament to fewer, larger guns requires them to be mounted in ways giving them wide arcs of fire. This effectively requires them to be outside the main hull and the protection it offers. Fully enclosed armoured turrets provide the required protection for the guns and their crew, allowing the ship to retain its firing capability even after sustaining hits.
column3: The change in armament to fewer, larger guns requires them to be mounted in ways giving them wide arcs of fire. This effectively requires them to be outside the main hull and the protection it offers. Fully enclosed armoured turrets provide the required protection for the guns and their crew, allowing the ship to retain its firing capability even after sustaining hits.
column4: The change in armament to fewer, larger guns requires them to be mounted in ways giving them wide arcs of fire. This effectively requires them to be outside the main hull and the protection it offers. Fully enclosed armoured turrets provide the required protection for the guns and their crew, allowing the ship to retain its firing capability even after sustaining hits.

column2: Consisting of a single steel plate with a hardened surface, Harvey Armour effectively provides the benefit of multi-layer compound armour without the drawback of compound layer separation under strain.
column3: Consisting of a single steel plate with a hardened surface, Harvey Armour effectively provides the benefit of multi-layer compound armour without the drawback of compound layer separation under strain.
column4: Consisting of a single steel plate with a hardened surface, Harvey Armour effectively provides the benefit of multi-layer compound armour without the drawback of compound layer separation under strain.

column2: Krupp armour offers a further improvement over Harvey armour by direct infusing of carbon gas into the steel under production, achieving a face-hardening with greater depth and thus higher stopping power.
column3: Krupp armour offers a further improvement over Harvey armour by direct infusing of carbon gas into the steel under production, achieving a face-hardening with greater depth and thus higher stopping power.
column4: Krupp armour offers a further improvement over Harvey armour by direct infusing of carbon gas into the steel under production, achieving a face-hardening with greater depth and thus higher stopping power.

column2: By fine-tuning the mix of elements used in Krupp armour, greater elasticity can be achieved without sacrificing resilience and stopping power. This decreases armour degradation from non-penetrating hits, a particularly useful trait during long naval engagements.
column3: By fine-tuning the mix of elements used in Krupp armour, greater elasticity can be achieved without sacrificing resilience and stopping power. This decreases armour degradation from non-penetrating hits, a particularly useful trait during long naval engagements.
column4: By fine-tuning the mix of elements used in Krupp armour, greater elasticity can be achieved without sacrificing resilience and stopping power. This decreases armour degradation from non-penetrating hits, a particularly useful trait during long naval engagements.

column2: Experiments and real-life experience has shown that by distributing armour unevenly to maximize the protection of vital parts of the ship, maximum survivability is achieved for a given armour weight. Our warships are from now on being built based on this paradigm.
column3: Experiments and real-life experience has shown that by distributing armour unevenly to maximize the protection of vital parts of the ship, maximum survivability is achieved for a given armour weight. Our warships are from now on being built based on this paradigm.
column4: Experiments and real-life experience has shown that by distributing armour unevenly to maximize the protection of vital parts of the ship, maximum survivability is achieved for a given armour weight. Our warships are from now on being built based on this paradigm.

column2: Torpedoes hit ships below the waterline, where thick armour protection is impractical. By the use of external bulges and buffering internal bulkhead layouts, the ability of warships to withstand torpedo hits can be increased without significantly increasing ship weight.
column3: Torpedoes hit ships below the waterline, where thick armour protection is impractical. By the use of external bulges and buffering internal bulkhead layouts, the ability of warships to withstand torpedo hits can be increased without significantly increasing ship weight.
column4: Torpedoes hit ships below the waterline, where thick armour protection is impractical. By the use of external bulges and buffering internal bulkhead layouts, the ability of warships to withstand torpedo hits can be increased without significantly increasing ship weight.

column2: By placing internal bulkheads at non-parallel angles to each other, the force of any hit is guaranteed to hit at least one of the bulkheads at a disadvantageous angle, decreasing internal damage caused by any hit penetrating the outermost armour belt.
column3: By placing internal bulkheads at non-parallel angles to each other, the force of any hit is guaranteed to hit at least one of the bulkheads at a disadvantageous angle, decreasing internal damage caused by any hit penetrating the outermost armour belt.
column4: By placing internal bulkheads at non-parallel angles to each other, the force of any hit is guaranteed to hit at least one of the bulkheads at a disadvantageous angle, decreasing internal damage caused by any hit penetrating the outermost armour belt.

column2: Our accumulated cultural achievements strengthen our national identity and increase social consciousness.
column3: Nos succès culturels cumulés fortifient notre identité nationale et augmentent notre conscience sociale.
column4: Unsere kulturellen Errungenschaften stärken unsere nationale Identität und das gesellschaftliche Bewußtsein.

column4: Unsere kulturellen Errungenschaften stärken unsere nationale Identität und das gesellschaftliche Bewußtsein.

column4: Unsere kulturellen Errungenschaften stärken unsere nationale Identität und das gesellschaftliche Bewußtsein.

column4: Unsere kulturellen Errungenschaften stärken unsere nationale Identität und das gesellschaftliche Bewußtsein.

column2: Our accumulated philosophical tradition accelerates our intellectual development.
column3: Notre tradition philosophique continue accélère nos progrès intellectuels.
column4: Unsere philosophischen Traditionen befördern die geistige Entwicklung unseres Landes.

column2: Our accumulated philosophical tradition accelerates our intellectual development.
column3: Notre tradition philosophique continue accélère nos progrès intellectuels.
column4: Unsere philosophischen Traditionen befördern die geistige Entwicklung unseres Landes.

column3: Notre tradition philosophique continue accélère nos progrès intellectuels.
column4: Unsere philosophischen Traditionen befördern die geistige Entwicklung unseres Landes.

column2: Our accumulated philosophical tradition accelerates our intellectual development.
column3: Notre tradition philosophique continue accélère nos progrès intellectuels.
column4: Unsere philosophischen Traditionen befördern die geistige Entwicklung unseres Landes.

column2: Our accumulated philosophical tradition accelerates our intellectual development.
column3: Notre tradition philosophique continue accélère nos progrès intellectuels.
column4: Unsere philosophischen Traditionen befördern die geistige Entwicklung unseres Landes.

column2: Notions of national fraternity are taking hold in our great country!
column3: L'idée de fraternité nationale progresse dans notre grand pays!
column4: Die Idee der nationalen Einheit verliert an Ausstrahlung in unserem Land!

column2: The cultural achievements of our Romanticists have strengthened the national identity of our country. Or, as the cynics would put it, invented one where none existed before. In any case, their efforts will make us into more of a national fraternity than we used to be. Also, art and literature being powerful means of expressing ideas, we can expect their achievements to increase the consciousness of our population, for good and ill.
column3: Les réalisations culturelles de nos romantiques ont renforcés notre identité nationale. Ou, pour être plus cynique, en ont créé une de toute pièce. De toute façon, leurs efforts consolident notre solidarité nationale. De plus, l'art et la littérature étant des moyens puissants d'exprimer des idées, nous pouvons nous attendre à ce que leurs réalisations augmentent la conscience de notre population, pour le meilleur ou pour le pire.
column4: The cultural achievements of our Romanticists have strengthened the national identity of our country. Or, as the cynics would put it, invented one where none existed before. In any case, their efforts will make us into more of a national fraternity than we used to be. Also, art and literature being powerful means of expressing ideas, we can expect their achievements to increase the consciousness of our population, for good and ill.

In any case, their efforts will make us into more of a national fraternity than we used to be. Also, art and literature being powerful means of expressing ideas, we can expect their achievements to increase the consciousness of our population, for good and ill.
column3: Les réalisations culturelles de nos réalistes ont renforcés notre identité nationale. Ou, pour être plus cynique, en ont créé une de toute pièce. De toute façon, leurs efforts consolident notre solidarité nationale. De plus, l'art et la littérature étant des moyens puissants d'exprimer des idées, nous pouvons nous attendre à ce que leurs réalisations augmentent la conscience de notre population, pour le meilleur ou pour le pire.

In any case, their efforts will make us into more of a national fraternity than we used to be. Also, art and literature being powerful means of expressing ideas, we can expect their achievements to increase the consciousness of our population, for good and ill.

column2: Realist culture telling them like it is? Oh my!
column3: Un mouvement réaliste montrant la réalité crue? Osé!
column4: Realismus sagt es, wie es ist? Oje.

Also, art and literature being powerful means of expressing ideas, we can expect their achievements to increase the consciousness of our population, for good and ill.

column2: Wait... didn't our Impressionists already do that?
column3: Attendez… ça n'avait pas déjà été fait par nos impressionnistes?
column4: Haben das nicht schon unsere Impressionisten getan?

In any case, their efforts will make us into more of a national fraternity than we used to be. Also, art and literature being powerful means of expressing ideas, we can expect their achievements to increase the consciousness of our population, for good and ill.

In any case, their efforts will make us into more of a national fraternity than we used to be. Also, art and literature being powerful means of expressing ideas, we can expect their achievements to increase the consciousness of our population, for good and ill.

column2: Frankly, I'd rather have our national identity do without that crap
column3: Honnêtement, je ne vois pas ce que ça apporte à notre identité nationale
column4: Natürlich sollten wir darauf verzeichten können...

column2: The work of our Idealist philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.
column3: Les travaux de nos philosophes idéalistes fournissent à nos intellectuels une meilleure compréhension de l'existence et de la nature du savoir. Cela va accélérer le développement intellectuel de notre pays.
column4: The work of our Idealist philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.

column2: The work of our Empiricist philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.
column3: Les travaux de nos philosophes empiricistes fournissent à nos intellectuels une meilleure compréhension de l'existence et de la nature du savoir. Cela va accélérer le développement intellectuel de notre pays.
column4: The work of our Empiricist philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.

column2: Does this improve our international competitivity?
column3: Mais est ce que ça améliore notre compétitivité internationale?

column2: The work of our Analytical philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.
column3: Les travaux de nos philosophes analytiques fournissent à nos intellectuels une meilleure compréhension de l'existence et de la nature du savoir. Cela va accélérer le développement intellectuel de notre pays.
column4: The work of our Analytical philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.

column2: I could do with a few more analysts, myself
column3: Quelques analystes de plus me seraient très utiles, c'est sûr.
column4: Ich könnte ein paar Analysen gebrauchen - von mir.

column2: The work of our Phenomenological and Hermeneutical philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.
column3: Les travaux de nos philosophes phénoménologistes et herméticistes fournissent à nos intellectuels une meilleure compréhension de l'existence et de la nature du savoir. Cela va accélérer le développement intellectuel de notre pays.
column4: The work of our Phenomenological and Hermeneutical philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.

column2: When will this give us better warships?
column4: Wann haben wir bessere Kriegsschiffe dadurch?

column2: The work of our Anti-Rationalist philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.
column3: Les travaux de nos philosophes antirationalistes fournissent à nos intellectuels une meilleure compréhension de l'existence et de la nature du savoir. Cela va accélérer le développement intellectuel de notre pays.
column4: The work of our Anti-Rationalist philosophers has provided our intellectual class with a deeper fundamental understanding of existence, and of the nature of knowledge. This will accelerate the intellectual development of our country.

column2: Anti-Rationalist? Not sure I like the sound of that!
column4: Irgendwie komisch, aber ich mag den Namen.

column2: Notions of national fraternity have taken hold on our country, and glorious feelings of national belonging run higher and deeper than they ever have before in the history of our country!
column3: Des idées de fraternité nationale s'imposent dans notre pays, et les glorieux sentiments d'appartenance à la nation sont plus forts que jamais auparavant!
column4: Die Idee der nationalen Einheit verliert an Ausstrahlung in unserem Land und glorreiche Gefühle für unsere nationalen Eigenheiten und Belange sind so tief und weit verbreitet, wie noch nie in der Geschichte unseres Landes!

column2: Our Ministry of Finance reports that our real GDP has grown at a greater rate than our money supply. To avert deflation and recession, the Central Bank has printed a railcar-load of money and left it in the national treasury.
column3: Notre ministère des finances nous informe que notre PIB a crû plus rapidement que notre masse monétaire. Pour éviter une récession déflationniste, la banque centrale a imprimé un plein wagon de billets et les a laissés au trésor public.
column4: Unser Finanzminister hat festgestellt, dass unser Bruttoinlandsprodukt schneller gewachsen ist, als der Geldumlauf. Um der Gefahr einer Rezession und Deflation zu begegnen, hat unsere Nationalbank einen Eisenbahnwagon voll mit frischen Geldscheinen drucken lassen und lagert diese nun im Tresor der Bank.

column2: Gain the §G$VALUE$§W-fold of possible Taxes to Treasury.
column3: Le trésor publique gagne §G$VALUE$§W fois les impôts possibles.
column4: Nationalbank erhält das §G$VALUE$§W-fache an möglichen Steuern.
